## ‚ú® Introduction

TransEat is a website to keep track of what you eat and how you feel later on. It serves as a food diary to help you understand what can potentially cause you discomfort.

It started as a need for personal use, but it looks like nothing existed to fulfill this need. So I decided to create it myself to learn more about Vue 3 and also Supabase.

‚ÑπÔ∏è This project is still work in progress, no website is available yet. And the logic between components is a bit random, I wanted to learn all possible ways to do things in Vue 3.

## üöÄ Features

- Create, Edit, Delete days with a note
- Add or remove dishes to a day
- Change the feeling and the time of a dish
- Browse all content as a guest
- Login with Supabase (no registration for now)
- Logout from the website

## üì• Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/QuentiumYT/TransEat.git
cd TransEat/
# Install node requirements
npm install # or bun install
# Run the website
npm run dev # or bun run dev
```

## üèóÔ∏è Structure

- `src/assets` contains images and other assets
- `src/components` contains all the components used in the website
- `src/utils` contains constants and supabase configuration

### üñáÔ∏è Relation schema

There are 3 models: Users, Days, and Health.

- Users contains the user's information specific to the app, it is linked to Supabase's `auth.users` table.
- Days contains the day's information, it is linked to the user's ID.
- Health contains the dish's information, it is linked to the day's ID.

### üóÑÔ∏è Tables

`Users` _______________________ `Days` ___________________ `Health`

| Column  | Type    |  | Column  | Type |  | Column  | Type    |
|---------|---------|--|---------|------|--|---------|---------|
| id      | INT     |  | id      | INT  |  | id      | INT     |
| id_user | UUID    |  | id_user | UUID |  | id_day  | UUID    |
| name    | VARCHAR |  | date    | DATE |  | feeling | VARCHAR |
| image   | TEXT    |  | note    | TEXT |  | dish    | TEXT    |
|         |         |  |         |      |  | time    | VARCHAR |

## üõ†Ô∏è Technologies

- [Vue 3](https://v3.vuejs.org/)
- [Vite](https://vitejs.dev/)
- [Bun](https://bun.sh/)
- [Supabase](https://supabase.io/)
- [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com/)

None yet, but you can check the code to understand how it works :)
